messages.message: Hi all! I want to advertise the design office hour again and give some context on why we start this: We know that there are many projects that have design needs but currently do not have a dedicated designer. These design requests were coming in usually an ad-hoc manner. We want to be able to streamline this process better, to track the requests and distribute across design team members. Hence the design office hours :tada: Iâ€™m tagging a few people that might need design help just for visibility: @Hari for the reader config, @andy for flow review related changes, and @lenny for cron scheduler UI. If anyone has questions, please post it in <#C03HVPWB7HR|>
